messages.content: You are a tech specialist and you create functional and non-functional requirements

HealthMate is a comprehensive healthcare management app designed to empower patients to take control of their health. The app integrates with various IoT health devices like blood pressure monitors, glucose meters, and fitness trackers. Users can view their health metrics in real-time, set reminders for medication, schedule doctor's appointments, and even consult with healthcare professionals via video calls. The app aims to be a one-stop solution for all healthcare needs.

2 Requirements

2.1 Functional Requirements

1. Authentication Pages:
• The app must allow users to sign in and sign up using email, password, and two-factor authentication.
• The app should offer social media login options.

2. Health Metrics Dashboard Page:
• The app must display real-time health metrics from connected IoT devices.
• The app should allow users to manually enter health data.

3. Medication Reminder Page:
• The app must allow users to set medication reminders with options for dosage and frequency.

4. Appointment Scheduling Page:
• The app must enable users to schedule, reschedule, or cancel doctor's appointments.

5. Video Consultation Page:
• The app must offer a secure video consultation feature with healthcare professionals.

6. Data Export Page:
• The app should allow users to export their health data in a standard format like PDF or CSV.

2.2 Non-Functional Requirements

1. Reliability:
• The app must have a minimum uptime of 99.9%.
• The app should have a backup and recovery mechanism.

2. Performance:
• The app should load health metrics within 2 seconds.
• The app should support simultaneous video consultations for at least 100 users.

3. Usability:
• The app must be accessible, following WCAG 2.1 guidelines.
• The app should offer a tutorial for first-time users.

4. Security:
• All health data must be encrypted both in transit and at rest.
• The app must comply with healthcare data regulations like HIPAA.

5. Scalability:
• The app should be designed to handle an increasing number of IoT devices and users.
• The app should be cloud-native to allow for easy scaling.
You are a tech specialist and you create functional and non-functional requirements

EcoTrack is an application designed to help individuals monitor and reduce their carbon footprint. The app allows users to input various types of activities like travel, food consumption, and energy usage to calculate their overall carbon impact. It also provides tips and recommendations for reducing one's footprint and allows users to set goals and track their progress over time. The app aims to make sustainability more accessible and actionable for everyone.

2 Requirements

2.1 Functional Requirements

1. Authentication Pages:
• The app must allow users to sign in and sign up using email and password.
• The app must include a 'Forgot Password' feature that sends a reset link to the user's email.
• Success message must be displayed after successful registration or login.

2. Carbon Tracking Page:
• The app must allow users to input activities that contribute to their carbon footprint.
• Success message must be displayed after successfully adding an activity.

3. Goals and Progress Page:
• The app must allow users to set sustainability goals and track their progress.
• Success message must be displayed after successfully setting or updating a goal.

4. Tips and Recommendations Page:
• The app must provide tips and recommendations for reducing carbon footprint.

5. Reporting Page:
• The app must allow users to view detailed reports of their carbon footprint over time.
• Success message must be displayed after successfully generating a report.

2.2 Non-Functional Requirements

1. Reliability:
• The app must have a minimum uptime of 99.5%.
• The app should have a backup and recovery mechanism.

2. Performance:
• The app should load activities and reports within 3 seconds.

3. Usability:
• The app must be user-friendly and offer a tutorial for first-time users.

4. Security:
• All user data must be encrypted both in transit and at rest.
• The app must comply with data protection regulations.

5. Scalability:
• The app should be designed to handle an increasing number of users and activities.
• The app should be cloud-native to allow for easy scaling.
You are a tech specialist and you create functional and non-functional requirements

2 Requirements

5. Scalability:
• The app should be designed to handle an increasing number of users and data points.
• The app should be cloud-native to allow for easy scaling.
• The app should be modular to allow for the addition of new features without affecting existing functionality.
